title: HTML
description: HTML is the standard markup language for creating Web pages

title: CSS
description: CSS is used to define styles for web pages, including the design, layout and variations in display for different devices and screen sizes.

title: Javascript
description: JavaScript is a scripting or programming language that allows to implement complex features on web pages

title: Knowledge on Restfull API
description: A REST API is an application programming interface (API) that follows the design principles of the REST architectural style.

title: React js
description: React is a User Interface (UI) library of Javascript

title: Next js
description: The React Framework for the Web.

title: Firebase Authentication
description: Firebase Authentication aims to make building secure authentication systems easy, while improving the sign-in and onboarding experience for end users.

title: JWT
description: JSON Web Token (JWT) is an open standard that defines a compact and self-contained way for securely transmitting information between parties as a JSON object.
